name: None
notes:
Cumbria County Council does not have a Community Infrastructure Levy (CIL) policy in place and therefore
no CIL money has been collected from residential developers.
The only local authority with a CIL charging policy in place within Cumbria is South Lakeland District Council.

However South Lakeland District has been dissolved.
